name: manically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a very excited or anxious (= worried and nervous) way, that causes you to be very physically active: Still grinning manically, she kisses him on the cheek. On a couple of occasions he ran manically into the road and almost got run over.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was dancing so manically that she was asked to calm down.He has worked manically since arriving 11 days ago.When she does go out, she's either very quiet and thoughtful, or manically happy.
